dt: {bc}a punctuation mark - used especially to divide or to compound words, word elements, or numbers

et: Late Latin & Greek; Late Latin, from Greek, from {it}hyph' hen{/it} under one, from {it}hypo{/it} under + {it}hen{/it}, neuter of {it}heis{/it} one {ma}{mat|up|}, {mat|same|}{/ma}
shortdef: a punctuation mark - used especially to divide or to compound words, word elements, or numbers
